parameters.query:
-- Connection test
SELECT 
  1 as connection_test,
  NOW() as db_timestamp,
  version() as postgres_version,
  current_setting('server_version') as server_version;

-- Core tables health check
SELECT 
  schemaname,
  tablename,
  tableowner,
  hasindexes,
  hasrules,
  hastriggers
FROM pg_tables 
WHERE schemaname = 'public' 
  AND tablename IN ('studies', 'users', 'study_sessions', 'study_applications', 'templates')
ORDER BY tablename;

-- Performance and statistics
SELECT 
  t.schemaname,
  t.tablename,
  pg_size_pretty(pg_total_relation_size(c.oid)) as total_size,
  pg_size_pretty(pg_relation_size(c.oid)) as table_size,
  c.reltuples::bigint as estimated_row_count,
  pg_stat_get_numscans(c.oid) as seq_scans,
  pg_stat_get_tuples_returned(c.oid) as tuples_read
FROM pg_tables t
JOIN pg_class c ON c.relname = t.tablename
WHERE t.schemaname = 'public' 
  AND t.tablename IN ('studies', 'users', 'study_sessions', 'study_applications')
ORDER BY pg_total_relation_size(c.oid) DESC;

-- Data integrity checks
SELECT 
  'studies' as table_name,
  COUNT(*) as total_records,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE created_at IS NULL) as missing_created_at,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE title IS NULL OR title = '') as missing_title,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status NOT IN ('draft', 'active', 'paused', 'completed')) as invalid_status
FROM studies

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'users' as table_name,
  COUNT(*) as total_records,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE created_at IS NULL) as missing_created_at,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE email IS NULL OR email = '') as missing_email,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE role NOT IN ('researcher', 'participant', 'admin')) as invalid_role
FROM auth.users

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'study_sessions' as table_name,
  COUNT(*) as total_records,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE created_at IS NULL) as missing_created_at,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE study_id IS NULL) as missing_study_id,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE participant_id IS NULL) as missing_participant_id
FROM study_sessions;

-- RLS policy verification
SELECT 
  schemaname,
  tablename,
  policyname,
  permissive,
  roles,
  cmd,
  qual
FROM pg_policies 
WHERE schemaname = 'public' 
  AND tablename IN ('studies', 'study_sessions', 'study_applications')
ORDER BY tablename, policyname;
